Creature.Name: Baba Yaga
Creature.DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks

Traits.name: Legendary Resistance
Traits.description: If Baba Yaga fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Traits.name: Magic Resistance
Traits.description: Baba Yaga has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Actions.name: Multiattack
Actions.description: Baba Yaga makes three attacks: one with her staff and two with her claws.

Actions.name: Staff
Actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

Actions.name: Claw
Actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

LegendaryActions.name: Frightening Gaze
LegendaryActions.description: Baba Yaga fixes her gaze on one creature she can see within 10 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute.

LegendaryActions.name: Teleport
LegendaryActions.description: Baba Yaga magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.
